widgets.nrql: from SystemSample   select    filter(uniquecount(hostname), WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance' ) AS 'Total Servers',    filter(uniquecount(hostname), WHERE provider IS NULL) AS 'On-Premises Servers',   filter(uniquecount(hostname), WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance') AS 'AWS Servers'
widgets.title: Server Locations

widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts'  FACET cases(  WHERE provider IS NULL as 'On-Premises',      WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance' as 'AWS')
widgets.title: Server Locations

widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction   SELECT     filter(uniquecount(appName), WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS' ) AS 'Total Apps',  filter(uniquecount(appName), WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP') AS 'On-Premise',  filter(uniquecount(appName), WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS') AS 'AWS'
widgets.title: Application Locations

widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction  SELECT uniqueCount(appName) AS 'Applications'  FACET cases(  WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' as 'On-Premises',      WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' as 'AWS')
widgets.title: Application Locations

widgets.nrql: from SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(*),where result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Avail rate' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Uptime - Today versus yesterday

widgets.nrql: from SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(*),where result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability %' FACET monitorName
widgets.title: Availability

widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com'  FACET appName LIMIT 5 since 10 minutes ago
widgets.title: Longest Average Duration Per App
